vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to extend a service contract with HLP, Inc. for continuous maintenance and support for the service request and work order management software for the Department of Dallas Animal Services for the period February 2, 2023 through February 1, 2026 - HLP, Inc., sole source - Not to exceed $190,560 - Financing: General Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
